title: End Of The Seahawks, Le'Veon Bell's Future with guest Ryan Wilson (Football 03/09)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports NFL Writer Ryan Wilson to update Le'Veon Bell's situation in Pittsburgh and how it will play out throughout this offseason and beyond. Will and Ryan also discuss the impending doom to the Legion of Boom and Seahawks defense with the trade of Michael Bennett and seemingly imminent departure of Richard Sherman
